txt.en: You have destroyed much of the forsaken coal within Búrzangh.
Búrzangh, the Shrouded Forge, can be found in the Circle of Sorrow in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should destroy the forsaken coal.
You have destroyed much of the forsaken coal within the Shrouded Forge of Búrzangh. The Rangers of Ithilien will be pleased with your efforts.

The Dead are moulded and remade within the Shrouded Forge of Búrzangh, to serve those in control of Minas Morgul. The dark forges are fuelled by corrupted and forsaken coal that is mined from the Mountains of Shadow. You should destroy this coal in order to halt the efforts of those in the Shrouded Forge.
Búrzangh, the Shrouded Forge, can be found in the Circle of Sorrow in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should destroy the forsaken coal.
The Dead are moulded and remade within the Shrouded Forge of Búrzangh, to serve those in control of Minas Morgul.
